import requests, json
api_data = requests.get('https://api.sleeper.app/v1/league/1124784521578180608/matchups/2')
api_data = json.loads(api_data.text)

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, FloatType, ArrayType, MapType, LongType

schema = StructType([
    StructField("points", FloatType(), True),
    StructField("players", ArrayType(StringType()), True),  # Array of player IDs as strings
    StructField("roster_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("custom_points", FloatType(), True),  # Can be null, so keep as float or nullable
    StructField("matchup_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("starters", ArrayType(StringType()), True),  # Array of starter IDs as strings
    StructField("starters_points", ArrayType(FloatType()), True),  # Array of points as floats
    StructField("players_points", MapType(StringType(), FloatType()), True)  # Map of player ID (string) to points (float)
])
df = spark.createDataFrame(data = api_data, schema=schema)

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode, col, array_contains

df_exploded = df.withColumn("player", explode(col("players")))

# Use 'players_points' to map the points for each player
df_with_points = \
    df_exploded\
    .withColumn("player_points", col("players_points")[col("player")])\
    .withColumn("is_starter", array_contains(col("starters"), col("player")))

# Show the result
display(df_with_points)

_FILE_PATH = "abfss://raw@spotifyfam.dfs.core.windows.net/sleeper/players/players_992125474790772736_2024-07-17T03:40:50.3694529Z.json"

json_str = spark.read.text(_FILE_PATH).collect()

# Join the lines of text to form the full JSON string
json_str = ''.join([row.value for row in json_str])

# Parse the JSON string using Python's json library
import json
data = json.loads(json_str)

# Now you can manipulate the data as a Python dictionary

data = [v for k, v in data.items() if isinstance(v, dict) and 'player_id' in v.keys()]
# data = [row for row in data if isinstance(row, dict) and 'player_id' in row.keys()]

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, BooleanType, ArrayType, LongType, StructType

schema = StructType([
    StructField("birth_state", StringType(), True),
    StructField("opta_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("pandascore_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("injury_status", StringType(), True),
    StructField("espn_id", IntegerType(), True),  # Integer now
    StructField("position", StringType(), True),  # WR, String
    StructField("news_updated", LongType(), True),  # Timestamp in ms
    StructField("sport", StringType(), True),
    StructField("fantasy_data_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("sportradar_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("team", StringType(), True),
    StructField("birth_date", StringType(), True),  # String but represents a date
    StructField("team_abbr", StringType(), True),
    StructField("gsis_id", StringType(), True),  # gsis_id as String
    StructField("rotoworld_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("injury_start_date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("depth_chart_position", StringType(), True),
    StructField("search_rank", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("practice_participation", StringType(), True),
    StructField("player_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("yahoo_id", IntegerType(), True),  # Integer now
    StructField("stats_id", IntegerType(), True),  # Integer now
    StructField("search_full_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("search_first_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("practice_description", StringType(), True),
    StructField("number", IntegerType(), True),  # Integer
    StructField("injury_body_part", StringType(), True),
    StructField("oddsjam_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("depth_chart_order", StringType(), True),
    StructField("swish_id", IntegerType(), True),  # Integer now
    StructField("first_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("age", IntegerType(), True),  # Age as Integer
    StructField("status", StringType(), True),
    StructField("height", StringType(), True),  # Keep as String for now
    StructField("high_school", StringType(), True),
    StructField("birth_country", StringType(), True),
    StructField("metadata", StructType([              # Struct for metadata
        StructField("rookie_year", StringType(), True),
        StructField("channel_id", StringType(), True)
    ]), True),
    StructField("weight", StringType(), True),  # Keep as String for now
    StructField("years_exp", IntegerType(), True),  # Integer for experience
    StructField("search_last_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("rotowire_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("full_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("injury_notes", StringType(), True),
    StructField("active", BooleanType(), True),  # Boolean
    StructField("hashtag", StringType(), True),
    StructField("last_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("college", StringType(), True),
    StructField("fantasy_positions", ArrayType(StringType()), True),  # Array of Strings
    StructField("competitions", ArrayType(StringType()), True),  # Empty array
    StructField("birth_city", StringType(), True)

# selected_fields_df = joined_df.select(
#     "full_name", "team", "position", "player_points", "is_starter", "custom_points", 
#     "birth_state", "birth_city", "birth_date", "college", "high_school", 
#     "injury_status", "injury_notes", "injury_body_part", "injury_start_date", 
#     "years_exp", "metadata.rookie_year",  # Correctly accessing rookie_year from metadata
#     "age", "height", "weight", 
#     "fantasy_positions", "depth_chart_position", "depth_chart_order"
# )

selected_fields_df = joined_df.select(
    "matchup_id", 
    "roster_id", col("points").alias("roster_points"), 
    "player_id", "first_name", "last_name", "position", "team", "player_points", "is_starter", "injury_status", "injury_notes", "years_exp", "search_rank", "height", "weight", "high_school", "college", "age", "birth_date" ,"birth_state", "birth_city"

from pyspark.sql.types import DoubleType

schema = StructType([
    StructField("owner_id", StringType(), True),  # Add owner_id
    StructField("roster_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("metadata", StructType([  # Nested StructType for metadata
        StructField("record", StringType(), True),
        StructField("streak", StringType(), True)
    ]), True),
    StructField("settings", StructType([  # All fields in settings are IntegerType
        StructField("fpts", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("fpts_against", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("fpts_against_decimal", IntegerType(), True),  # Changed to IntegerType
        StructField("fpts_decimal", IntegerType(), True),          # Changed to IntegerType
        StructField("losses", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("ppts", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("ppts_decimal", IntegerType(), True),          # Changed to IntegerType
        StructField("ties", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("total_moves", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("waiver_budget_used", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("waiver_position", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("wins", IntegerType(), True)
    ]), True)

df_flattened = df.select(
    "owner_id", 
    col("roster_id").alias("roster"), 
    col("metadata.record").alias("record"),  # Flatten metadata
    col("metadata.streak").alias("streak"),  # Flatten metadata
    col("settings.fpts").alias("fpts"), 
    col("settings.fpts_against").alias("fpts_against"), 
    col("settings.fpts_against_decimal").alias("fpts_against_decimal"), 
    col("settings.fpts_decimal").alias("fpts_decimal"), 
    col("settings.losses").alias("losses"), 
    col("settings.ppts").alias("ppts"), 
    col("settings.ppts_decimal").alias("ppts_decimal"), 
    col("settings.ties").alias("ties"), 
    col("settings.total_moves").alias("total_moves"), 
    col("settings.waiver_budget_used").alias("waiver_budget_used"), 
    col("settings.waiver_position").alias("waiver_position"), 
    col("settings.wins").alias("wins")
)
columns_to_rename = [col_name for col_name in df_flattened.columns if col_name not in ["owner_id", "roster"]]

renamed_columns = [col(col_name).alias(f"roster_{col_name}") if col_name in columns_to_rename else col(col_name) for col_name in df_flattened.columns]

df_roster = df_flattened.select(*renamed_columns)

from pyspark.sql.functions import concat_ws


selected_fields_df.alias("selected_fields_df")
df_roster.alias("df_roster")

joined_df = selected_fields_df.join(df_roster, selected_fields_df["roster_id"] == df_roster["roster"], "left")

df_fixed = joined_df.withColumn(
    "roster_ppts", 
    (col("roster_ppts") + (col("roster_ppts_decimal") / 100)).cast("double")
).withColumn(
    "roster_fpts", 
    (col("roster_fpts") + (col("roster_fpts_decimal") / 100)).cast("double")
).withColumn(
    "roster_fpts_against", 
    (col("roster_fpts_against") + (col("roster_fpts_against_decimal") / 100)).cast("double")
)

# Drop the decimal columns as they are now combined into the main columns
df_fixed = df_fixed.drop("roster_ppts_decimal", "roster_fpts_decimal", "roster_fpts_against_decimal")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, BooleanType, MapType, NullType

schema = StructType([
    StructField("avatar", StringType(), True),
    StructField("display_name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("is_bot", BooleanType(), True),
    StructField("is_owner", BooleanType(), True),
    StructField("league_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("metadata", StructType([  # Nested StructType for metadata
        StructField("allow_pn", StringType(), True),
        StructField("archived", StringType(), True),
        StructField("avatar", StringType(), True),
        StructField("mascot_item_type_id_leg_1", StringType(), True),
        StructField("mascot_message_emotion_leg_1", StringType(), True),
        StructField("mascot_message_leg_3", StringType(), True),
        StructField("mention_pn", StringType(), True),
        StructField("team_name", StringType(), True)
    ]), True),
    StructField("settings", NullType(), True),  # Assuming settings is null in this case
    StructField("user_id", StringType(), True)
])

df = spark.createDataFrame(users_api_data, schema)

# Select only the required columns: user_id, display_name, and metadata.team_name
df_users = df.select(
    col("user_id").alias("user"), 
    "display_name", 
    col("metadata.team_name").alias("team_name")  # Flatten metadata.team_name

full_df = selected_fields_df.join(df_users, selected_fields_df['owner_id'] == df_users['user'], 'left')

#joined_df = df_with_points.join(df_player, df_with_points["player"] == df_player["player_id"], "left_outer")
